text:
Changes to site_printable.vsl:
- updated copyright to 2003
- added index/next/prev links if present in document header
- added "Updated: $date" footer if date present in header

Changes to usermanual pages:
- added prev, next and date attributes to document
- fixed a link in build-adv-web-test-plan and anchor in get-started
- added XP and VMS to list of OSes
creator: tjsb@slb.com
tjsb@slb.com
text:

Created attachment 6748
usermanual.patch - add next/prev and some minor tweaks

text:
Note: I did not update site.vsl (but can do so if required). The extra 
attributes in the individual document headers do not affect the web-site 
output - they are ignored.
